_description: This package.json defines the backend Node.js application for ShadowNews - an email-first Hacker News clone with snowball distribution. Contains all dependencies, scripts, and configuration needed for the Express.js API server with MongoDB, Redis, WebSocket support, and background job processing.
name: shadownews-backend
description: Backend API for Shadownews - Enhanced Hacker News Clone with Email-First Architecture and Snowball Distribution
_scripts_description: Production: start | Development: dev | Testing: test/test:watch/test:coverage | Code Quality: lint/lint:fix/format | Database: seed/migrate | Documentation: docs

scripts._start_comment: Production server startup - runs the main server without file watching
scripts._dev_comment: Development server with auto-reload on file changes using nodemon
scripts._test_comment: Run all unit and integration tests using Jest testing framework
scripts._test_watch_comment: Run tests in watch mode - automatically re-runs tests when files change
scripts._test_coverage_comment: Run tests with code coverage reporting to identify untested code
scripts._lint_comment: Check code for style and potential error issues using ESLint
scripts._lint_fix_comment: Automatically fix ESLint issues where possible
scripts._format_comment: Format all JavaScript files using Prettier for consistent code style
scripts._seed_comment: Populate database with sample data for development and testing
scripts._migrate_comment: Run database migrations to update schema or transform data
scripts._docs_comment: Generate API documentation from code comments and route definitions

_keywords_comment: Search keywords for npm registry and project identification
author: Shadownews Team
_dependencies_comment: Production Dependencies - Required for application runtime
_dependencies_description: Core: express/mongoose/dotenv | Security: cors/helmet/bcryptjs/jsonwebtoken | Performance: compression/redis | Real-time: socket.io | Email: nodemailer/@sendgrid/mail | Jobs: bull/node-cron | AI: openai/natural | Utils: lodash/moment/uuid

dependencies._express_comment: Fast, unopinionated web framework for Node.js - handles HTTP routing, middleware, and API endpoints
dependencies._mongoose_comment: MongoDB object modeling library with schema validation, middleware, and query building
dependencies._dotenv_comment: Loads environment variables from .env file for configuration management
dependencies._cors_comment: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing middleware for handling frontend requests
dependencies._helmet_comment: Security middleware that sets various HTTP headers to protect against common vulnerabilities
dependencies._compression_comment: Gzip compression middleware to reduce response sizes and improve performance
dependencies._rate_limit_comment: Rate limiting middleware to prevent abuse and DDoS attacks
dependencies._bcryptjs_comment: Password hashing library for secure user authentication
dependencies._jwt_comment: JSON Web Token implementation for stateless authentication
dependencies._express_validator_comment: Middleware for validating and sanitizing user input
dependencies._multer_comment: Middleware for handling multipart/form-data file uploads
dependencies._csv_parser_comment: Fast CSV parser for processing repository email imports
dependencies._fast_csv_comment: Fast CSV reading and writing library for data export/import
dependencies._nodemailer_comment: Email sending library supporting SMTP and various email services
dependencies._nodemailer_handlebars_comment: Handlebars template engine integration for rich email templates
dependencies._sendgrid_comment: SendGrid email service integration for reliable email delivery
dependencies._mailparser_comment: Email parsing library for processing incoming emails
dependencies._bull_comment: Redis-based job queue for background tasks like email processing and digest generation
dependencies._redis_comment: Redis client for caching, session storage, and job queue backend
dependencies._socketio_comment: Real-time bidirectional communication for live updates and notifications
dependencies._winston_comment: Flexible logging library with multiple transports and log levels
dependencies._morgan_comment: HTTP request logger middleware for debugging and monitoring
dependencies._axios_comment: Promise-based HTTP client for external API requests
dependencies._openai_comment: OpenAI API client for AI-powered features like content summarization
dependencies._natural_comment: Natural language processing library for text analysis and processing
dependencies._node_cron_comment: Cron job scheduler for periodic tasks like cleanup and digest generation
dependencies._sanitize_html_comment: HTML sanitization library to prevent XSS attacks in user content
dependencies._marked_comment: Markdown parser for rendering user content and documentation
dependencies._slugify_comment: URL-friendly slug generation for posts and repositories
dependencies._lodash_comment: Utility library providing helpful functions for data manipulation
dependencies._moment_comment: Date and time manipulation library for formatting and calculations
dependencies._joi_comment: Object schema validation library for API input validation

_devDependencies_comment: Development Dependencies - Only needed during development and testing
_devDependencies_description: Development: nodemon | Testing: jest/supertest/mongodb-memory-server/faker | Code Quality: eslint/prettier | Types: @types/jest

devDependencies._nodemon_comment: Development server that automatically restarts when files change
devDependencies._jest_comment: JavaScript testing framework with built-in assertions, mocking, and coverage
devDependencies._supertest_comment: HTTP integration testing library for testing API endpoints
devDependencies._types_jest_comment: TypeScript type definitions for Jest testing framework
devDependencies._mongodb_memory_comment: In-memory MongoDB server for testing without external database
devDependencies._faker_comment: Library for generating fake data for testing and database seeding
devDependencies._eslint_comment: Linting tool for identifying and fixing JavaScript code issues
devDependencies._eslint_airbnb_comment: Airbnb's ESLint configuration for consistent code style
devDependencies._eslint_import_comment: ESLint plugin for validating import/export statements
devDependencies._prettier_comment: Code formatting tool for consistent code style across the project

_engines_comment: Minimum required versions for Node.js and npm
_engines_description: Ensures compatibility and prevents issues with older Node.js versions that lack required features

engines._node_comment: Requires Node.js 18+ for modern JavaScript features and performance improvements
engines._npm_comment: Requires npm 9+ for improved package resolution and security features
